channel.title: Looking for 24/7 no-ip hoster
channel.description:
I cannot run my server anymore, so I am looking for a no-ip hoster. You need a router to host it. I want the name for the server's ip to be "Unitedpk.no-ip.info" (no "'s). If you need help with no-ip, I'll help you. My source is [b]CLOSED![/b] so don't try to be smart and start stealing my work. To run the server, click on compile + runserver and press r. Then go to a Voule Auto restarter icon that looks like a computer, and double click it. Then hit 10 minutes and click start. Post here if you can host.
[b][i][u]24/7 NO-IP HOSTERS ONLY![/u][/i][/b]

item.title: Looking for 24/7 no-ip hoster
